name: Circle Space
description:
A relaxing game in which you have to travel across planets. The goal is simple, try to land on the largest number of planets and beat your record.

The difficulty is constantly increasing, challenging you to get a higher score.

Enjoy a minimalist design, a relaxing music and a simple gameplay.

How to play?

Click to jump to the next planet

Contact me for any suggestions or comments
